level.heading: Judicial review.
level.text: A person aggrieved by a final decision of the Mayor may appeal the decision to the District of Columbia Court of Appeals pursuant to § 2-510.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary addition of subchapter, see notes to § 7-2031.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-215, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-2031.
